attributes.action: give a posthumous pardon to Steve Thoburn, Metric Martyr , and all others who have been found guilty of using Imperial measurements on labelling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU has at last accepted that dual marking of metric and imperial measurements should continue indefinitely. Given this those who defended the right of the British citizen to continue to use our traditional weights and measures should be given an absolute pardon

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
